H0.text: On the banks of which river does the Welsh city of Carmarthenstand. Usk

H1.text: On the banks of which river does the Welsh city of Carmarthenstand. Teifi

H2.text: On the banks of which river does the Welsh city of Carmarthenstand. Severn

H3.text: On the banks of which river does the Welsh city of Carmarthenstand. Tywi

A4.text: In Carmarthen, it is joined by a substantial tributary, the River Gwili, at Abergwili.
